snippet: Had the measure passed, it would have limited the ability of the governor, Andrew M. Cuomo, a Democrat, to shape the state’s highest court.
abstract: New York State voters reject constitutional amendment raising mandatory retirement age to 80 for judges on Supreme Court and Court of Appeals.
lead_paragraph: Had the measure passed, it would have limited the ability of the governor, Andrew M. Cuomo, a Democrat, to shape the state’s highest court.

headline.main: Plan to Raise Judges’ Retirement Age to 80 Is Rejected
headline.print_headline: Plan to Raise Judges’ Retirement Age to 80 Is Rejected
